description:
Ryuusui is a genin from http://anidb.net/ch12202 [Amegakure], though he has a scratch through the village symbol on his headband to indicate his loyalty to http://anidb.net/ch11993 [Pain].
He and his partner, http://anidb.net/ch17695 [Yuudachi], are captured by http://anidb.net/ch7213 [Jiraiya]. When they refused to tell Jiraiya any information on Pain, even after tickle torture on his partner, he transformed Yuudachi into a frog, which frightened Ryuusui into divulging information about Pain. Jiraiya then tries to control Ryuusui in an attempt to find Pain, but is found by http://anidb.net/ch11994 [Konan]. Ryuusui then follows Konan`s orders to leave and is able to escape.
name: Ryuusui
